comment: The nonpartisan GAO is run by someone confirmed to a year term in under a Democrat President , Democrat controlled Senate and Democrat House .
amr:
# ::snt The nonpartisan GAO is run by someone confirmed to a year term in under a Democrat President , Democrat controlled Senate and Democrat House .
(r / run-01
      :ARG0 (s / someone
            :ARG1-of (c / confirm-01
                  :prep-under (a / and
                        :op1 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / political-party
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Democrat"))
                                    :ARG2 (p3 / president)))
                        :op2 (g / government-organization
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Senate")
                              :ARG1-of (c2 / control-01
                                    :ARG0 p2))
                        :op3 (g2 / government-organization
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "House")
                              :ARG1-of c2
                              :ARG0 p2))))
      :ARG1 (g3 / government-organization
            :name (n4 / name
                  :op1 "GAO")
            :mod (p4 / partisan
                  :polarity -)))

comment: Just like Pelosi , Schiff and the Dems in Congress , the GAO ignores that the President has been hugely concerned about corruption in Ukraine for a long time , which is entirely consistent with US law and US policy . It s also important to get other nations to contribute more .
amr:
# ::snt Just like Pelosi , Schiff and the Dems in Congress , the GAO ignores that the President has been hugely concerned about corruption in Ukraine for a long time , which is entirely consistent with US law and US policy . It s also important to get other nations to contribute more .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (ii / ignore-01
            :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                  :name (n / name
                        :op1 "GAO"))
            :ARG1 (c / concern-01
                  :ARG0 (c2 / corrupt-01
                        :location (c3 / country
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Ukraine")))
                  :ARG1 (p / person
                        :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                              :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
                  :ARG1-of (l / long-03)
                  :ARG1-of (c4 / consistent-01
                        :ARG2 (a / and
                              :op1 (l2 / law
                                    :mod (c5 / country
                                          :name (n3 / name
                                                :op1 "US")))
                              :op2 (p3 / policy-01
                                    :ARG0 c5))
                        :degree (e / entire)))
            :ARG1-of (r / resemble-01
                  :ARG2 (a2 / and
                        :op1 (p4 / person
                              :name (n4 / name
                                    :op1 "Pelosi"))
                        :op2 (p5 / person
                              :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG1 (p6 / political-party
                                          :name (n5 / name
                                                :op1 "Democrat"))))
                        :location (g2 / government-organization
                              :name (n6 / name
                                    :op1 "Congress")))
                  :mod (j / just)))
      :snt2 (ii2 / important-01
            :ARG1 (g3 / get-04
                  :ARG1 (c6 / contribute-01
                        :ARG0 (n7 / nation
                              :mod (o / other))
                        :ARG1-of (h3 / have-quant-91
                              :ARG3 (m2 / more))))
            :mod (a3 / also)))

comment: Let s see a GAO report on Pres Obama delivering $ Bil in pallets of cash to Iran in the middle of the night as cash ransom in a hostage swap . I don t recall any Congressional notification or approval before that Obama foreign policy decision not authorized by Congress .
amr:
# ::snt Let s see a GAO report on Pres Obama delivering $ Bil in pallets of cash to Iran in the middle of the night as cash ransom in a hostage swap . I don t recall any Congressional notification or approval before that Obama foreign policy decision not authorized by Congress .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / see-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (w / we)
            :ARG1 (r / report-01
                  :ARG0 (g / government-organization
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "GAO"))
                  :ARG1 (d / deliver-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :name (n2 / name
                                    :op1 "Obama")
                              :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                    :ARG2 (p2 / president)))
                        :ARG1 (c / cash
                              :quant (p3 / pallet))
                        :ARG2 (c2 / country
                              :name (n3 / name
                                    :op1 "Iran"))
                        :time (m2 / middle
                              :part-of (n4 / night))
                        :ARG1-of (c3 / cause-01
                              :ARG0 (r2 / ransom-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG1 (c4 / cash)
                                    :subevent-of (s2 / swap-01
                                          :ARG1 (h2 / hostage)))))))
      :snt2 (r3 / recall-02
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (o / or
                  :op1 (n5 / notify-01
                        :ARG0 (g2 / government-organization
                              :name (n6 / name
                                    :op1 "Congress")))
                  :op2 (a / approve-01
                        :ARG0 g2)
                  :time (b / before
                        :op1 (t / thing
                              :ARG1-of (d2 / decide-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG3 (p4 / policy-01
                                          :ARG2 (f / foreign)))
                              :ARG1-of (a2 / authorize-01
                                    :polarity -
                                    :ARG0 g2))))))
